drug-interaction.name: Picosulfuric acid
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Picosulfuric acid can be decreased when used in combination with Avilamycin.

drug-interaction.name: BCG vaccine
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of BCG vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Avilamycin.

drug-interaction.name: Typhoid vaccine
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Typhoid vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Avilamycin.

drug-interaction.name: Dicoumarol
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Avilamycin is combined with Dicoumarol.

drug-interaction.name: Phenindione
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Avilamycin is combined with Phenindione.

drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Avilamycin is combined with Warfarin.

drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Avilamycin is combined with 4-hydroxycoumarin.

drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Avilamycin is combined with Coumarin.

drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Avilamycin is combined with (R)-warfarin.
